data.title: Evan Goldberg on LinkedIn: NetSuite has been fortunate to have some amazing people involved in its…
data.meta_description: NetSuite has been fortunate to have some amazing people involved in its 25-year journey. It was great to see so many familiar faces come together to celebrate…
data.text:
Evan Goldberg’s Post

Founder and EVP of Oracle NetSuite

10mo

NetSuite has been fortunate to have some amazing people involved in its 25-year journey. It was great to see so many familiar faces come together to celebrate last week – that’s the power of the NetSuite community.

Like Comment

Transcript

What a great 25 years. Happy birthday. On to the next 25. I can most definitely say you're getting better with age. Happy anniversary, sweetie. One of my greatest personal and professional experiences was proudly serving as a member of the NetSuite board for 10 years, and I'd like to take the time now to wish them a happy 25th anniversary. Here's the next 25 years now. Sweet. From the start with those four Oracle guys above the hair salon to today with thousands of employees, partners and 10s of thousands of customers, it's been an amazing ride. Congratulations next week on 25 very successful years. Happy 25th anniversary next week and here's to the next 25 years. Congratulations Nest Suite on 25 years. The best board I ever served on Happy 25th NetSuite. Happy 25 years of NetSuite. 25 years. Boy does that make me feel old. 25 looks great on you. That sweet. Congratulations to Evan and the entire team. Happy 25 years to NetSuite. Years congratulations and thank you, NetSuite. Happy 25th anniversary, NetSuite. Hey, NetSuite, Congratulations on 25 years of fantastic performance, best ever from Avalara from 1998 until now. What a journey.
